name: The Gift Tornado
description:
Santa accidentally caused the creation of a gift tornado, help him catch the gifts before they land on the ground and break, but be careful because some bad vegetable got mixed up in the mess.

This game was made in 9 hours (3h of creating the graphics, 3h of programming and 3h of chosing the musics) for the Trijam: The Ultimate Extreme Mega Edition
